string-array.name: msg_detail
string-array.item: Hey, Can you send me the assignment so we can finish it quickly!
Can you tell Joseph to meet me in the Cafetaria at 5 PM?
Are you ready for the seminar tomorrow? i can't wait to see it!
Hi Ben, I've attached the contract for our new freelance designer who starts working with us next months.
Hi Ben, It was great to connect with you at CodeFun event and i'd love to meet with you more.
Dear Ben, We're holding a birthday party at JD's Bar on the next month and would love you to be there.
Hey man, I saw your post on traffic metrics, Loved it my guy!
Hi Ben, We just want to take this opportunity to thank you for choosing GigaByte as your company's provider of computer hardware.
Hey Ben, I will be on vacation between April 1 - April 7. I'm going to Spanish to watch Real Madrid. Hala Madrid!
Thank you for reaching out to learn more about Marketing ABC! The best way to learn about our offerings as they pertain to your particular business.
